outline:
1. to wait, look for, hope, expect
    1. (Qal) waiting (participle)
    2. (Piel)
      1. to wait or look eagerly for
      2. to lie in wait for
      3. to wait for, linger for
    3. to collect, bind together
      1. (Niphal) to be collected
kjv_def: gather (together), look, patiently, tarry, wait (for, on, upon).
strongs_def: to bind together (perhaps by twisting), i.e. collect; (figuratively) to expect
